name: SUS MANAGER
description:
RESUME

In the game you manage a hospital and you have to build the different parts of a hospital, contract employee, and many other things.

Bindings:

Move - Arrow keys or wasd

Zoom - Middle mouse button

Interact - Left mouse button

DELETE CONSTRUCTIONS - E

Tutorial: BUY TERRAIN

BUILD LANDS BY CLICKING ON THEM, THE LANDS WILL BE BUILT IF YOU HAVE ENOUGH MONEY TO PURCHASE THEM

CONSTRUCTION

YOU NEED TO BUILD AT LEAST ONE CONSTRUCTION OF EACH OF THESE TYPES:  /  /  /  / 

HIRE

WHEN CONSTRUCTING SOMETHING THE OPTION FOR CONTRACTING APPEARS IN THE CORNER OF THE SCREEN, PRESS ON THE MIDDLE ICON:  CHOOSE FROM THREE OPTIONS OF EMPLOYEES AND CONTRACT THEM, HIRING INFLUENCE IN THE SPEED OF SERVICE AND DISCOUNT OF MONEY AT THE END OF THE DAY

UPGRADE

THE GAME HAS ONLY AN UPGRADE AND WHEN PURCHASING IT WILL HAVE THE OPTION TO LEAVE THE AUTOMATIC TREATMENT, BUT THE AUTOMATIC TREATMENT, HAS 80% EFFECTIVENESS, THAT IS, 1 IN EACH 5 SERVICE, RECEIVED THE WRONG DIAGNOSTIC

MANUAL TREATMENT

THERE IS THE OPTION TO LEAVE THE AUTOMATIC AND MANUAL TREATMENT, BUT THERE CAN ONLY BE A MANUAL TREATMENT IN THE ENTIRE GAME 

THE MANUAL TREATMENT WORKS AS FOLLOWS: WHEN A PATIENT ARRIVES AT THE CONSULTATION A SOUND WILL PLAY AND IN THE MENU THE TREATMENT TAB WILL BE IN ANOTHER COLOR, AT THE TIGHTENING SEE THE DATA THROUGH THE NEXT AND BACK BUTTONS, AND GIVE THE DIAGNOSIS WITH THE BUTTONS SIDE

RESTART

IF AT ANY TIME THE GAME IS NOT WORKING GOES UP TO THE OPTIONS WITH THIS ICON  CLICK ON IT AND OPEN THE MENU, PRESS THE BEGIN BUTTON RESET DAY, TO REMOVE ALL THE REMAINING PATIENTS

OTHERS

AT THE END OF EACH DAY, THE REMAINING MONEY WILL BE SUBTRACTED BY THE EMPLOYEES 'SALARY AND THE COSTS OF MEDICINES, AS YOU ARE A MEDICAL STUDENT WORKING AT SUS YOU DO NOT KNOW WHAT YOU ARE DOING BUT IF YOU MAKE A MISTAKE THEN SOMEONE WILL DO VERY POORLY, SO MAKE WISE CHOICES

ENJOY THE GAME!!!
